tool_description: A set of API endpoints that provide Hong Kong financial market data
title: Hong Kong Finance

api_list.name: Option Open Interest
api_list.description: Returns option open interest data across all strikes and expiries, for a given underlying
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hong-kong-finance.p.rapidapi.com/optionOpenInterest/{underlying}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hong-kong-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
